calendar.preferences_tooltip_slotsize: If you select '15 mins', your calendar slots display in 15-minute intervals.
calendar.tooltip_preset_duration: Select the preset duration of a new appointment
calendar.settingSidebar_tooltip_slotfrequency: Select how often appointments can be booked. If you select '15 minutes', appointment times are available every 15 minutes.
calendar.offhour_workinghour: This enables you to schedule appointments outside of your working hours.
calendar.enable_2: To add a Google Meet link, enable 2-way Google sync.
calendar.enable_2-way_sync: to add a google meet link, enable 2-way google sync.
calendar.contactadmin_assign_services: contact admin to assign [] to services
calendar.assign_you_services: contact admin to assign you to services
calendar.not_assigned_services: you're not assigned to any services
calendar.assign_services_button: contact the account admin to assign you. this required to book appointments.
calendar.not_assigned_classes: you're not assigned to any classes
calendar.assign_classes_button: contact the account admin to assign you. this required to book classes.
calendar.sca_regulation_message: due to sca regulations in your region, payment must be taken in cash to complete this transaction.
calendar.sca_cash_integration: due to sca regulations in your region, payment must be taken in cash. you can do this via setmore cash register.
calendar.double_multiple: This enables you to schedule multiple appointments in the same time slot.
calendar.already_booked: The following appointments can't be confirmed as you're already booked. You can skip them and proceed to confirm the rest, or close this window to make edits to the full series:
calendar.video_add: To add a video link , enable the Teleport,Zoom or Google Meet integration
calendar.contact_admin_zoom: Contact the admin to enable Zoom for this service.
calendar.videolink_zoom: To add a video link, enable Zoom for this service.
calendar.contact_zoomid: Contact the admin to assign a Zoom ID to your profile.
calendar.contact_staff: Contact the admin to assign a Zoom ID to [Staff first name]’s profile.
calendar.assign_self: Assign a Zoom ID to your profile.
calendar.contact_service_enable: Contact the admin to enable Zoom for this service and your profile.
calendar.contact_service_staff: Contact the admin to enable Zoom for this service and staff member.
calendar.enable_zoom_staff: To add a video link, enable Zoom for this service and staff member.
calendar.contact_admin_service: Contact the admin to enable Google Meet for this service.
calendar.enable_meet: To add a video link, enable Google Meet for this service.
calendar.contact_enable_profile: Enable 2-way Google sync for your profile and contact the admin to enable video for this service.
calendar.contact_enable_staff: Enable 2-way Google sync for this staff member and contact the admin to enable video for this service.
calendar.enable_sync_service: To add a video link, enable Google Meet for this service and 2-way Google sync your profile.
calendar.link_sync_Staff: To add a video link, enable Google Meet for this service and 2-way Google sync for this staff member.
calendar.staffprofile_assignzoom: Assign a Zoom ID to [Staff first name]’s profile.
calendar.staffgooglemeet_twowaysync: To add a Google Meet link, enable 2-way Google sync for [Staff first name].
calendar.adminmessage_teleportintegration: Contact the admin to enable the Teleport video integration.
calendar.videolink_teleportintegration: To add a video link, enable the Teleport video integration.
calendar.adminmessage_telportzoommeet: Contact the admin to enable the Teleport, Zoom or Google Meet integration.
calendar.videolink_telportzoommeet: To add a video link, enable the Teleport, Zoom or Google Meet integration.

common.message1: Accept easy contactless payments via PayPal, credit or debit cards, and more.
common.message2: Everything you need to accept payments and run your business.
common.take_credit_or_debit_card_payments_throu: Take credit or debit card payments through your Booking Page or calendar.
common.time_based_operations: Required to configure all the time based on operations on your Number.
common.automate_notifications: Automate notifications for new, edited and cancelled bookings
common.edited_rescheduled_bookings: Automate notifications for edited or rescheduled bookings
common.admin_has_updated_language: The account admin has updated your app’s default language from
common.take_effect_click_refresh: For the change to take effect, simply click ‘Refresh’.
common.click_the_activate: Click the ‘Activate’ button on the left side of this window.
common.you_can_now: You can now take payments from your calendar. To accept Booking Page payments, navigate to Settings > Payments > Booking Page Payments.
common.account_for_cash: Account for cash transactions at different locations and on the go.
common.bookng_payments_navigation: You can now take payments from your calendar. If you’d like to take payments from your Booking Page, navigate to Settings > Payments > Booking Page

common.copy_code_squareline: Copy the code below and log into Square Online.

easyshare.make_class_private: Make this class visible/hidden to Booking page visitors

easyshare.class_order_updateerror: Class order could not be updated

integrations.setmore_banner_description: Enhance customer experience by connecting Setmore with your go-to marketing, video, payment and CRM platforms.
integrations.google meet_description: Provide crystal-clear video appointments through Google Meet.
integrations.google meet_cardtitle: Reach more customers virtually with Google Meet
google meet_long_description: With the Google Meet integration, you can schedule and host crystal-clear video appointments. Provide your services online and make it easy for a global audience to connect with you. When a video-enabled service is booked, the provider and customer both receive a Google Meet link in their email confirmations.
Get started now and offer frequent and flexible virtual sessions.
google meet_instruction: Click the ‘Activate’ button on the left side of this window.
A pop-up will tell you Google Meet is active. To enable video meetings for specific staff, select ‘Go to staff’.
Within each staff profile, select the ‘Calendar’ tab. Next to the Google Calendar option, click ‘Connect’.
Flip the ‘Google sync’ switch to on.
Go to Settings > Services and specify which services to provide over video. When these are booked, Google Meet links are automatically created.
integrations.zoom_description: Add Zoom video links to appointments and group sessions.
integrations.zoom_cardtitle: Host appointments and classes virtually with Zoom
zoom_long_description: Meet customers from all over the world with no travel required. The Zoom integration makes it straightforward to provide one-on-one and group services online. Simply select a service to offer over video and Setmore attaches a Zoom link when it’s booked. Your customers can join sessions directly from their email confirmations.
Whether you’re hosting a team meeting or product demo, one click is all it takes to start.
zoom_instruction: Click the ‘Activate’ button on the left side of this window.
Enter your Zoom account details and allow Setmore to connect.
Specify which services to provide over video. Zoom links are created for applicable bookings and sent to your customers.
integrations.teleport_description: Offer 1-click video appointments with no downloads necessary.
integrations.teleport_cardtitle: Add 1-click video meeting links to appointments
teleport_long_description: Host virtual meetings over Teleport and connect with teammates and customers across the globe. You can speak face-to-face with the click of a link, reducing the need for travel. Share your screen, record sessions and customize your online meeting room.

When a Teleport-enabled service is booked, Setmore automatically generates a meeting link and adds it to staff and guest email confirmations. Maximize your bookable hours and meet customers in the browser – no downloads required.
teleport_instruction: Click the ‘Activate’ button on the left side of this window.
Select services to provide over video.
A Teleport meeting link will be generated for applicable bookings.
integrations.facebook_description: Seamlessly move visitors from liking and sharing to booking appointments online
facebook_long_description: Empower Facebook fans to schedule appointments through your business page and posts. By displaying a ‘Book Now’ button, your page turns into an all-new channel for conversion.

This integration covers the Facebook mobile app, web app and Messenger, enabling customers to reserve your time without leaving Facebook. Showcase your top 10 services while linking to more on your Booking Page
facebook_instruction: Click the ‘Activate’ button on the left side of this window
Follow the prompts to link your Setmore and Facebook accounts.
Complete the integration to start taking bookings from your Facebook business page.
integrations.instagram bookings_description: Accept appointments directly from your IG posts, ads and business page.
integrations.instagram bookings_cardtitle: Get bookings from your IG page and posts
instagram bookings_long_description: Make your Instagram page work harder by featuring a ‘Book now’ button. Your business page, posts and ads not only raise awareness, but enable viewers to schedule appointments right away. They don’t even need to leave the Instagram app.
New bookings appear in your Setmore calendar in real-time and both you and your customer receive instant confirmations.
instagram bookings_instruction: Open the Instagram mobile app, go to your page and click ‘Edit Profile’.
In the ‘Public business information’ section, select ‘Action buttons’.
Opt for ‘Book Now’ and select Setmore from the list of partners.
Log into Setmore and click ‘Continue as [your Instagram profile name]’.
When ‘Confirm Your Business’ appears, tap 'Next' and your 'Book Now' button is activated.
You can also activate this integration on web using your Facebook account.
integrations.instagram streaming_description: Highlight your brand and service quality by featuring IG posts on your Booking Page
integrations.instagram streaming_cardtitle: Offer a full picture of your business with an IG stream
instagram streaming_long_description: Personalize your Booking Page with a stream of photos that highlight your services in action, facilities, team and more. When you activate this integration, Setmore will ask you to specify a hashtag. From there, your Booking Page pulls in any new posts that use it.
Encourage more visitors to follow through by showcasing your brand values and service quality – as soon as they hit your Booking Page.
instagram streaming_instruction: Click the ‘Activate’ button on the left side of this window.
The Instagram login screen will appear. Enter your username and password.
Choose an account and follow the prompts to connect it with Setmore.
After activation, return here and specify one or more hashtags (A field will appear below). Only tagged photos will display in the ‘Photos’ tab of your Booking Page.
integrations.paypal_description: Accept easy contactless payments via PayPal, credit or debit cards, and more.
integrations.paypal_cardtitle: Take digital wallet and card payments with PayPal
paypal_long_description: Offer your audience additional payment methods by connecting Setmore and PayPal. Once this integration is activated, you can accept PayPal, credit card and debit card payments through your Booking Page. Enhance your customers’ self-scheduling experience, get paid ahead of time and boost commitment to attendance.
You'll also be able to collect payments in-person through your calendar. To get started, all you need are Setmore Premium and a PayPal account.
paypal_instruction: Click the ‘Activate’ button on the left side of this window.
Log in with your PayPal credentials and grant access to Setmore.
You can now take payments from your calendar. To accept Booking Page payments, navigate to Settings > Payments > Booking Page Payments.
integrations.cash_description: Account for cash transactions at different locations and on the go.
integrations.cash_cardtitle: Count those coins for appointments and classes
cash_long_description: Activate Setmore’s cash register to record cash payments from customers and create printable or digital receipts. When you open your calendar to create a new appointment, you have the option to confirm a cash payment was made.
Transaction details are stored for easy reference and can be synced with your go-to accounting app.
cash_instruction: Click the ‘Activate’ button on the left side of this window.
To record a cash payment, open your calendar and select the relevant appointment.
You’ll see a ‘New Payment’ button. Click it and log the transaction.
To review previous payments, navigate to Settings > Payments > Payment History. Cash register can be used in conjunction with other payment integrations like Square or Stripe.
integrations.square_description: Get paid for your services through your Booking Page and calendar
integrations.square_cardtitle: Get booked with Setmore, get paid with Square
square_long_description: Make it simple to accept and track payments for all of your services. With the Square integration and a card reader, you can process transactions through your calendar, Booking Page and the Setmore mobile app.
Collect payment from wherever your business takes you, and not only that, enable customers to book and pay for appointments online. Payments reach you as soon as the next business day.
square_instruction: Click the ‘Activate’ button on the left side of this window.
Log in with Square and authorize Setmore to connect.
You can now take payments from your calendar. If you’d like to take payments from your Booking Page, navigate to Settings > Payments > Booking Page
integrations.lawpay_description: Enable leads and clients to pay in advance through your Booking Page.
lawpay_long_description: Empower your clients to pay ahead of consultations with the LawPay integration. A payment gateway is added to your Booking Page, enabling visitors to schedule and pay securely via credit or debit card.
Not only does this convenience help to convert more leads, but time spent on invoicing is massively reduced. To top it off, transaction details sync in real-time between your apps.
lawpay_instruction: Click the ‘Activate’ button on the left side of this window.
Log in with your LawPay username and password.
By default, Booking Page payments are optional. You can set payments to mandatory by navigating to Settings > Payments > Booking Page. Click ‘Okay’ in the final pop-up.
integrations.stripe_description: Collect credit and debit card payments at the point of booking.
integrations.stripe_cardtitle: Create an all-in-one booking and payment system
stripe_long_description: Take credit and debit card payments at the point of booking and track every transaction. With the Stripe integration, customers can pay online through your Booking Page, and you can accept in-person payments through your calendar.
To start, all you need is Setmore Premium and an active Stripe account.
stripe_instruction: Click the ‘Activate’ button on the left side of this window.
Log in with Stripe and authorize Setmore to connect.
You can now take payments from your calendar. If you’d like to take payments from your Booking Page, navigate to Settings > Payments > Booking Page.
integrations.booking widget_description: Display a convenient ‘Book Now’ button that opens your Booking Page.
integrations.booking widget_cardtitle: Empower customers to book directly from your website
booking widget_long_description: Add a ‘Book Now’ button to any site page in just a few steps. When visitors click, your Booking Page opens instantly. You can choose between a static button that displays in one part of your page (e.g. below your bio or in the header) and a wrapper button that remains visible while people scroll. Feature as many buttons as you like and capitalize on visits from new leads.
integrations.booking widget_st1: Step 1: Where will your ‘Book Now’ button display?
integrations.booking widget_st1a1: In a specific part of my site page
integrations.booking widget_st1a2: On the side of my site page at all times
integrations.booking widget_st2: Step 2: What will happen when this button is clicked?
integrations.booking widget_st2a1: A booking window will appear on my site page
integrations.booking widget_st2a2: My Booking Page will open in a new browser tab
integrations.booking widget_st3: Step 3: How will you add the button code to your site?
integrations.booking widget_st3a1: My web guru will add the code
integrations.booking widget_st4: Step 4 - Where would you like to receive the code?
integrations.joomla_description: Feature a customizable ‘Book Now’ button on your Joomla website
integrations.joomla_cardtitle: Enable customers to book through your Joomla site
joomla_long_description: There’s zero need for your online audience to call or email you for an appointment. By connecting your Booking Page with your Joomla website, every visitor can self-schedule right away. Add a ‘Book Now’ button or a dedicated booking section on any site page, and capitalize on all of that traffic.
The decision-making cycle is shorter, helping bring more customers to your door.
joomla_instruction: Click ‘Download Plugin’ on the left side of this window.
Select and copy your Setmore key (shown below).
Sign into your Joomla account to complete integration.
integrations.jimdo_description: Enhance your Jimdo site with a custom ‘Book Now’ button
integrations.jimdo_cardtitle: Get booked and paid from your Jimdo website
jimdo_long_description: Your site tells the world why your business is special. It’s a showcase of your services, your team’s expertise, customer testimonials and more. Enhance any page with a ‘Book now’ button to ensure captivated visitors can schedule appointments 24/7.
When clicked, your Booking Page appears and shares your real-time availability.
jimdo_instruction: Select and copy the code provided below.
In Jimdo Editor, open the ‘Elements’ menu and select ‘Add a Widget/HTML Element’.
Position this element where you’d like your ‘Book now’ button to appear.
Paste the code and click ‘Save’ to finish.
integrations.shopify_description: Convert more leads with booking options for your Shopify website.
integrations.shopify_cardtitle: Take bookings 24/7 from your Shopify site
shopify_long_description: Add a ‘Book Now’ button to your Shopify website and turn traffic into new customers. Visitors can self-schedule your services at the peak of interest, quickly and easily. When an appointment is booked, the details land in your calendar and Setmore fires email confirmations to both you and your guests.
Here’s how to connect your Booking Page with any Shopify site page.
shopify_instruction: Copy the code below and log into Shopify.
Go to ‘Themes’ and click the ‘Customize’ button. In the left navigation, open the ‘Custom HTML’ settings.
Paste your code into the HTML box located in ‘Content’.
Publish your changes and your booking button is ready
integrations.squarespace_description: Empower visitors to book while browsing your Squarespace website.
integrations.squarespace_cardtitle: Add booking options to your Squarespace site
squarespace_long_description: Feature a 'Book Now' button on any page and offer site visitors an instant path to reserve your time. People can browse your content, read about your services and team, and self-schedule appointments without calling.
All they need to do is click the 'Book Now' button and your Booking Page appears, showcasing your real-time availability.
squarespace_instruction: Copy the code below and log into Squarespace.
Select 'Pages' and open the page that will feature your 'Book Now' button.
Click the teardrop shape to the left. You'll see options to insert a new element – choose 'Code'.
Remove the default code and paste the code from Setmore. Save your changes and your 'Book Now' button is ready.
integrations.wix_description: Turn traffic into customers by taking bookings through your Wix website
integrations.wix_cardtitle: Add your custom Booking Page to your Wix site
wix_long_description: Enhance any page of your Wix website with a ‘Book Now’ button. When clicked, your customers are directed to your Booking Page and can self-schedule an appointment. Your site goes from promoting your services to bringing in new customers.
Cut down the back-and-forth and enable visitors to confirm appointments independently, at any time.
wix_instruction: Copy your Booking Page URL (shown below).
In Wix, open any page and click the ‘Add’ (+) button in the left navigation bar.
Select Embed > Custom embed > Embed a widget.
Double-click the widget and paste your URL.
Click 'Update' and your Booking Page appears. Click ‘Publish’ to save.
integrations.wordpress_description: Enable customers to book online through your WordPress website.
integrations.wordpress_cardtitle: Accept bookings 24/7 from your WordPress website
wordpress_long_description: Connecting your Booking Page and WordPress website is a breeze. Add a ‘Book Now’ button to any site page and make it easy for visitors to reserve your time. There’s zero need for them to contact you directly, speeding up decision-making and filling your calendar faster.
wordpress_instruction: Log into WordPress and click ‘Plugins’ in the left navigation bar.
Select ‘Add New’ and search for Setmore.
Locate the Setmore plugin and select Install Now > Activate. ‘Active’ indicates the integration was successful.
The plugin is now visible in the left navigation bar. Click it to log into Setmore.
Follow the prompts to complete and your ‘Book Now’ button is ready.
integrations.drupal_description: Enable motivated leads to book straight from your Drupal site
integrations.drupal_cardtitle: Take bookings 24/7 from your Drupal website
drupal_long_description: Enhance any page of your Drupal website with a ‘Book now’ button. This conveniently opens your Booking Page, enabling visitors to schedule and pay for appointments independently.
There’s no need for anyone to contact you about available time slots. Confirmations are sent to both you and your customer, and the appointment details land in your calendar instantly.
drupal_instruction: Click the ‘Download plugin’ button on the left side of this window.
Select and copy the Setmore key provided below.
In a new tab, log into Drupal and click Modules > Install new module.
Upload the plugin you downloaded and click ‘Install’.
Follow our support article to position and save your ‘Book now’ button.
integrations.weebly_description: Add your custom online Booking Page to your Weebly website
integrations.weebly_cardtitle: Accept bookings through your Weebly website
weebly_long_description: Feature a custom ‘Book Now’ button on your Weebly website and enable visitors to book appointments 24/7. This button opens your Booking Page where people can browse your availability, service menu and more.
Your Weebly website goes beyond promoting your services to converting leads, giving you an edge over competitors.
weebly_instruction: In the Weebly editor, select a page and open the toolbox.
Drag ‘Embed Code’ to where you’d like the ‘Book Now’ button to appear.
In the ‘Edit Code’ window, paste the code from earlier. Publish your changes and the button is ready.
integrations.square online_description: Connect your Booking Page with your Square Online website in minutes
integrations.square online_cardtitle: Enhance your Square Online site with 24/7 booking
square online_long_description: Add a 'Book Now' button to your Square Online site and turn more traffic into customers. You can feature a button on multiple pages, and when clicked, your Booking Page appears. Strike while the iron is hot and enable customers to book right after browsing your services and content. Appointment details land in your Setmore calendar in real-time
square online_instruction: Copy the code below and log into Square Online.
Open the page that will feature your 'Book Now' button and select 'Add section'.
To the left, a list of page elements will display. Click Embed code > Add.
Below 'Layout', tap 'Embed code' again and paste the code from Setmore.
Publish your changes and your 'Book Now' button is ready.
integrations.salesforce_description: Import new Setmore customers to your Salesforce client list.
salesforce_long_description: Automatically create a new contact in Salesforce when a new customer is created in Setmore. Kickstart your sales and marketing campaigns with the customers who are already booking appointments with your business.
salesforce_instruction: Click the Activate button on the left side of this window.
Enter your Salesforce username and password. To confirm Setmore has permission to share, click ‘Allow’.
Map the data fields (e.g. name, email address) between Setmore and Salesforce. This ensures the correct data populates the relevant fields.
integrations.insightly_description: Import your latest Setmore customer details to your Insightly client list
integrations.insightly_cardtitle: Import new customers to Insightly and optimize your CRM
insightly_long_description: Feed new lead and customer details straight to your preferred Insightly list. When a contact is added to Setmore through your Booking Page, your calendar or the ‘Customers’ tab, the entry reflects instantly in Insightly.

Your team has all the info it needs to keep the conversation going, helping to grow your pipeline and boost conversions. Not only that, but you can save time on manual data transfer and onboard your audience to tailored email campaigns.
insightly_instruction: Click the ‘Activate’ button on the left side of this window.
In a new tab, log into Insightly and navigate to Profile > User Settings > API Key. Copy the API key.
Paste the API key into Setmore where prompted. Click ‘Continue’
Select ‘Create or Update Contact’ and click ‘Continue’ one last time.
Map the data fields (e.g. name, email address) between Setmore and Insightly. This ensures the correct data populates the relevant fields.
integrations.clio_description: Transfer new client details from Setmore to Clio automatically
integrations.clio_cardtitle: Overrule manual data transfer with the Clio integration
clio_long_description: Focus on the case at hand while client information is sent from Setmore to Clio automatically. With this integration, any contact details collected through your calendar and Booking Page reflect instantly in Clio. Your CRM list stays up to date, making it straightforward to connect with clients and build stronger relationships.
Ready to save on admin time and boost your billable hours? Here’s how to integrate your apps
clio_instruction: Click the ‘Activate’ button on the left side of this window, then ‘Continue’.
Enter your Clio username and password to grant Setmore access. Confirm the action by clicking ‘Allow’.
Select ‘Contacts or Update Contact’ and click ‘Continue’.
Map the data fields (e.g. name, email address) between Setmore and Clio. This ensures the correct data populates the relevant fields.
integrations.zoho crm_description: Update your Zoho CRM contact list with your latest Setmore customer details.
integrations.zoho crm_cardtitle: Automatically add customer details from Setmore to your Zoho CRM list.
zoho crm_long_description: Feed new customer details into your Zoho CRM list. When customers feel seen and engaged, return visits take care of themselves. This integration sends customer contact details from Setmore to your preferred Zoho CRM list. Your newest visitors can be onboarded to tailored email campaigns right away, keeping your business fresh in mind.
As soon as new contact details are collected using your app or Booking Page, they reflect exactly in Zoho CRM. Share news, offers and more – high-quality outreach is never out of reach.
zoho crm_instruction: Click the ‘Activate’ button on the left side of this window.
Enter your Zoho CRM username and password.
Click ‘Allow’ to enable Setmore and Zoho CRM to share data.
integrations.slack_description: Receive automatic booking updates in Slack.
integrations.slack_cardtitle: Get live booking updates in Slack
slack_long_description: Connect Setmore to Slack and receive booking updates in a designated channel. With a real-time feed of activity, everyone stays in the loop.

When an appointment or customer profile is added or edited, you get an instant heads-up. There’s no need to refresh your inbox or keep switching between your calendar app and chat. Simply enable the integration once and updates appear in Slack automatically.
slack_instruction: Click the ‘Activate’ button on the left side of this window.
Enter your Slack domain name and click ‘Continue’. Next, enter your username and password and click ‘Sign In’.
Select a channel to receive updates from Setmore and click ‘Authorize’ to complete.
integrations.quickbooks_description: Automatically export Setmore payment data to your QuickBooks account.
integrations.quickbooks_cardtitle: Automatically send payment data to QuickBooks
quickbooks_long_description: Make bookkeeping a breeze by syncing payment details from Setmore to QuickBooks. With no need to transfer data between platforms, this integration saves you valuable time. Accuracy is also increased with data reflecting as it was originally recorded.
Did we mention that details also land in QuickBooks in real-time? Here’s how to connect your apps.
quickbooks_instruction: Click the ‘Activate’ button on the left side of this window.
Enter your QuickBooks credentials and select a list to sync with your Setmore payment records.
Map data fields from Setmore to fields in QuickBooks, then give the sync a test.
integrations.google calendar_description: Sync appointments and events between Google and Setmore.
integrations.google calendar_cardtitle: View your Setmore and Google events in one place
google calendar_long_description: Aligning your calendars is a must to keep tabs on your availability. 2-way calendar sync displays your Setmore appointments in Google Calendar and vice versa. New and edited details reflect from one calendar to the other in real-time.

You’re notified when attempting to book in an occupied slot, whether that time was reserved using Setmore or Google. Additionally, all times reserved by a Setmore or Google event are blocked from your Booking Page. Say so long to double-booking with a centralized view of your schedule on any device.
google calendar_instruction: Navigate to Settings > My Team and select a staff profile.
Open the ‘Calendar’ tab and click the ‘Connect’ button next to Google Calendar.
A pop-up will appear. Log into your Google account and click ‘Allow’ to grant Setmore access to connect.
You’ll be notified that your accounts are connected. Select a calendar from your Google account and click ‘Sync’ to complete.
integrations.office 365 calendar_description: Sync appointments and events between Office 365 and Setmore.
integrations.office 365 calendar_cardtitle: View your Setmore and Office 365 events in one place
office 365 calendar_long_description: Aligning your calendars is a must to keep tabs on your availability. 2-way calendar sync displays your Setmore appointments in Office 365 Calendar and vice versa.
New and edited details reflect from one calendar to the other in real-time. Say so long to double-booking with a centralized view of your schedule on any device
office 365 calendar_instruction: Navigate to Settings > My Team and select a staff profile.
Open the ‘Calendar’ tab and click the ‘Connect’ button next to ‘Office 365 Calendar’.
A pop-up will appear. Log into your Microsoft account and click ‘Allow’ to grant Setmore access to connect.
You’ll be notified that your accounts are connected. Select a calendar from your Microsoft account and click ‘Sync’ to complete.
integrations.gmail_description: Book appointments from your email inside your Gmail inbox.
integrations.gmail_cardtitle: Book appointments straight from your Gmail inbox
gmail_long_description: When an email contains an appointment date and time, the Setmore add-on for Gmail will pull them into a booking form. All you need to do is confirm the details and they’re automatically added to your calendar.
There’s no need to jump back and forth between your inbox and calendar, and your customer receives an instant booking confirmation.
gmail_instruction: In Gmail, click the ‘+’ icon in the right side panel.
Search for ‘Setmore for Gmail’ and install the add-on.
The add-on will now be available in the side panel. To finish set up, click the add-on and enter your Setmore username and password.
integrations.google analytics_description: Get visitor and performance insights from your Booking Page.
integrations.google analytics_cardtitle: Track, tailor and thrive with Google Analytics
google analytics_long_description: Add a Google Analytics tracking code to your Booking Page and gain valuable audience insights. With access to in-depth demographic and behavior data, you can target marketing to high-value visitors.
Connect with Google Analytics to reveal how much of your traffic is booking, the types of visitors engaging with your services, the platforms they were routed from and more.
google analytics_instruction: Open a new tab and log into Google Analytics.
Add your Booking Page details and copy the tracking code.
Return here and paste the code in the field below.
integrations.serviceminder_description: Transfer customer details from Setmore to your Serviceminder contact list.
integrations.serviceminder_cardtitle: Keep your Serviceminder list up-to-date with no manual transfers
serviceminder_long_description: Focus on the task at hand while your CRM platform updates in the background. With this integration, new customer details automatically transfer from Setmore to your preferred Serviceminder list.
Not only does this save you time, you can feed details into email campaigns to ensure customers stay engaged. Next time they need a home repair or service, your business is fresh in mind.
serviceminder_instruction: Click the ‘Activate’ button on the left side of this window.
Copy your API key from Serviceminder and paste it into Setmore. Click ‘Continue’.
Select ‘Contact or Update Contact’ and click ‘Continue’ one last time.
Map the data fields (e.g. name, email address) between Setmore and Serviceminder. This ensures the correct data populates the relevant fields.
integrations.zapier_description: Create custom Zaps to connect Setmore with countless apps.
zapier_long_description: With Zapier, you can share data between Setmore and a neverending list of apps. From sending appointment details straight to your Trello board, to adding new customers to ClickUp campaigns, there’s a Zap for every type of business.
Simply define a trigger (like booking an appointment) and the information to pull across (like appointment time and customer email). After enabling your Zap, data is shared automatically.
zapier_instruction: Log into Zapier and click ‘Make a Zap’.
Select an app to connect with Setmore and define the trigger and action.
Confirm the data you want to share from Setmore to the other app.
integrations.freshdesk_description: Schedule appointments directly from your Freshdesk dashboard.
integrations.freshdesk_cardtitle: Schedule appointments directly from your Freshdesk dashboard.
freshdesk_long_description: Tackle more tickets by adding the Setmore plugin to your Freshdesk dashboard. Your helpdesk agents can view your entire team’s availability and book appointments instantly. Not only does this reduce the back and forth, but customers are easily routed to the most relevant specialist.
With the Teleport, Zoom and Google Meet integrations, your agents can also confirm video meetings for specialists to provide remote solutions.
freshdesk_instruction: Log into Freshdesk and go to Settings > Apps. Search for ’Setmore’ in the marketplace and install the plugin.
The plugin will appear in the navigation bar of your Freshdesk dashboard. Click the Setmore plugin.
Select ‘Authorize’ and log into your Setmore account. You’ll be redirected to Freshdesk.
Clicking the Setmore plugin from now on will open your Booking Page in a pop-up.
integrations.zendesk_description: Empower your helpdesk agents to book appointments from inside Zendesk.
integrations.zendesk_cardtitle: Schedule appointments directly from your Zendesk dashboard
zendesk_long_description: Make it easier for your helpdesk to resolve more tickets with the Setmore and Zendesk integration. Your Booking Page appears in the Zendesk dashboard, enabling agents to view every team member’s availability and confirm appointments on the spot.
Appointment details land in the relevant team member’s calendar and reminders are automated for extra convenience.
zendesk_instruction: Log into Zendesk Sell and open the dashboard. Select Settings > Apps and search for Setmore in the marketplace.
Select ‘Install’ and log into Setmore. Follow the prompts to authenticate your account.
You’ll be redirected back to Zendesk Sell. Click ‘Install’ again to complete.
integrations.answerconnect_description: Enable a team of 24/7 call agents to schedule appointments for you.
integrations.answerconnect_cardtitle: Enable a team of 24/7 call agents to book appointments for you
answerconnect_long_description: Never miss a call with help from AnswerConnect. Your business is equipped with live call agents who ensure every customer receives a warm welcome. Not only do agents follow your custom script, they schedule appointments on your behalf.
Focus on providing your services while AnswerConnect agents line up new bookings in your Setmore calendar.
answerconnect_instruction: Click the ‘Sign up’ button on the left side of this window.
Log into AnswerConnect and head to Settings > Scheduling. Click ‘Activate’.
Select 'Launch app' and your Setmore calendar will open.
integrations.google tag manager_description: Monitor how visitors interact with your custom Booking Page.
integrations.google tag manager_cardtitle: Explore how visitors engage with your Booking Page
google tag manager_long_description: Ever wanted to dig deeper into your audience? With Google Tag Manager (GTM), you can gain insights into your Booking Page visitors, including demographics and behavior.

Apply filters and generate reports to unearth visitor numbers, and view graphical representations of age, gender, location and more. A one-time set-up gives you limitless knowledge. Use custom tag data to fine-tune your Booking Page and boost interaction
google tag manager_instruction: Open a new tab and log into your GTM account.
Open a container and copy the GTM container ID.
Return here and paste the ID in the field below.
From there, simply create tags to capture activity on your Booking Page.
integrations.constant contact_description: Automatically add new customer details to Constant Contact.
integrations.constant contact_cardtitle: Automatically add new customer details to Constant Contact.
constant contact_long_description: When someone books their first appointment, their details reflect from Setmore to your chosen Constant Contact list. It happens in real-time, keeping your CRM up-to-date without any manual data transfer.

Customer details collected through your calendar, Booking Page and the ‘Customers’ tab in your app all land in Constant Contact. New customers can be onboarded to targeted email campaigns, encouraging them to return and boosting loyalty.
constant contact_instruction: Click the ‘Activate’ button on the left side of this window, then ‘Continue’.
Enter your Constant Contact username and password to grant Setmore access.
Select ‘Contacts or Update Contact’ and click ‘Continue’.
Map the data fields (e.g. name, email address) between Setmore and Constant Contact. This ensures the correct data populates the relevant fields.
integrations.hubspot_description: Update your HubSpot contact list with your latest Setmore customer details.
integrations.hubspot_cardtitle: Build your HubSpot contact list with new customers from Setmore.
hubspot_long_description: Onboard new customers to tailored HubSpot campaigns.

With this integration, you can automatically export Setmore customer details to your preferred HubSpot contact list. Send your latest visitors relevant news and offers by email, to keep your services fresh in mind.
There’s no need for manual updates. New contact information collected through your app and Booking Page reflects in HubSpot accurately and in real-time
hubspot_instruction: Click the ‘Activate’ button on the left side of this window.
Enter your HubSpot username and password.
Follow the prompts to enable Setmore and HubSpot to share data.
integrations.mailchimp_description: Automatically add Setmore contacts to targeted email campaigns.
integrations.mailchimp_cardtitle: Keep the conversation going with Mailchimp
mailchimp_long_description: Automatically add your newest customers to targeted email campaigns. When contact details are collected through your Setmore calendar and Booking Page, they instantly reflect in your preferred Mailchimp subscriber list.
Ensure your audience stays engaged after that all-important first appointment. The most relevant offers and content head straight to their inbox.
mailchimp_instruction: Click the ‘Activate’ button on the left side of this window, then ‘Continue’.
Enter your Mailchimp account details and allow Setmore to connect.
Select ‘Add or update subscriber’ and click ‘Continue’.
Map the data fields (e.g. name, email address) between Setmore and Mailchimp. This ensures the correct data populates the relevant fields.
integrations.mailerlite_description: Automatically send new Setmore contacts to a MailerLite subscriber group
integrations.mailerlite_cardtitle: Keep the conversation going with MailerLite
mailerlite_long_description: Ensure that your newest customers come back for more by onboarding them to targeted email campaigns. This integration sends customer details collected through your calendar, Booking Page and ‘Contacts’ tab straight to MailerLite. After that all-important first appointment, your audience automatically receives tailored messaging, from special offers to company updates.
Simply choose a subscriber group in MailerLite and Setmore populates it with relevant contact info. Ready to turn more one-time customers into loyal fans?
mailerlite_instruction: Click the ‘Activate’ button on the left side of this window.
Confirm your MailerLite account. Below ‘Setup Trigger’, select ‘Contacts’.
Follow the steps to get your API key and paste it where prompted.
Select ‘Create or Update Subscriber’ and choose a subscriber group to update.
Specify the details to sync from Setmore to MailerLite and run a quick test.
integrations.to_enable_this: To enable this integration, you must allow Setmore and <APP NAME>to share details
integrations.you_must_select: You must select a business location to continue integrating your accounts. Please try again
integrations.to_host_video: To host video appointments using <APP NAME>, you’ll need to switch off the <APP NAME integration>
integrations.to_enable_your: To enable your team to host Google Meet appointments, you’ll need to open individual profiles and switch on ‘Google sync
integrations.activate_a_payment: Activate a payment integration to accept Booking Page payments
integrations.setmore_is_currently: Setmore is currently syncing your <APP NAME>. Please wait a few moments before de-activating the sync. Thank you for your patience!
integrations.support_team_contact: Chat with our support team from inside your account, call us at <CONTACT NUMBER> or email <SUPPORT EMAIL>.
integrations.integration_meets_complaince: Before activating, make sure that your use of the integration meets compliance and data security requirements, such as HIPAA, in your area <Terms of Service>.
integrations.third_party_integration: By enabling a 3rd Party Integration service, you hereby agree to assume HIPAA liability for your use of this service and agree to our HIPAA compliant <Terms of Service>.
integrations.only_tagged_pictures: Only tagged pictures from your Instagram account will be shown on your Booking page.

settings.connect_your_calendar: Use this link to connect your calendar to other calendar
settings.little_about_yourself: Tell the world a little about yourself

settings.custom_time_off: Add your custom time off days
settings.zone_business_operate: What time zone does your business operate in?

settings.explore_personalization_updates: Explore personalization options for updates sent to you.
settings.choose_types_receive: Choose the types of updates to receive.
settings.connect_chats_mentions: All Connect chats and mentions, plus appointment updates.
settings.direct_chats_mentions: Only direct chats and mentions, plus appointment updates.
settings.reduce_noshows_automatic: Reduce no-shows with automatic email and sms reminders for upcoming bookings
settings.information_custom_signoff: Enhance every update with essential information and a custom sign-off.
settings.receive_review_requests: Customers will receive review requests by email.
settings.view_recent_booking: View your most recent booking updates.
settings.report_will_display: A report will display for this date range when you click ‘Generate’.
settings.deafault_language: This will be your default language in the Setmore web application.
settings.activate_integration_payments: Activate a payment integration to accept Booking Page payments.
settings.collected_payment_cash: As you originally collected payment in [cash], you'll need to enable [cash register] to issue this refund.
settings.collected_payment_square: As you originally collected payment in [square], you'll need to enable [Square] integration to issue this refund.
settings.calendars_appointments: Connect your Calendars to manage your appointments from one place.
settings.temporary_password_emailed: A temporary password will be emailed to people you add.CancelInvite
settings.personalize_schedule_meetings: Personalize how people schedule meetings with you.
settings.download_free_qrcode: Download your free QR code and display it on your storefront, marketing and merch. With one quick scan using a smartphone camera,your customers are directed straight to your Booking Page.
settings.notice_before_meeting: How much notice do you require before a meeting?
settings.advance_schedule_meeting: How far in advance can people schedule a meeting?
settings.available_booking_slots: How often should available booking slots appear?
settings.meeting_reschedule_cancel: How soon before a meeting can people reschedule or cancel?
settings.booking_page_language: Visitors will see your Booking Page in this language.
settings.times_displayed: Choose how times will be displayed on your Booking Page.
settings.sections_visible: What sections will be visible to your Booking Page visitors.
settings.streamline_scheduling_experience: Streamline the scheduling experience to fill your calendar faster.
settings.form_fields_display: What form fields will display on your Booking Page.
settings.visitors_see: What will your visitors see when they browse your booking page.
settings.rename_booking_page: Rename how your Booking Page refers to services and staff, to suit your style of business.
settings.pop-up_message: Add a pop-up message to welcome your Booking Page visitors, promote an offer, share company news, and more.
settings.t_cs: Have any T&Cs that need to be accepted before booking? Add them below.
When a booking is confirmed, where will your customer be directed.
settings.label: Label
settings.pay_booking_online: Manage here if and how your clients have to pay when booking online
settings.accept_payments_A: Accept payments on my Booking Page
settings.payment_required: Is payment required at the time of booking?
settings.want_to_apply: Do you want to apply extra charges or reductions, such as taxes or discounts?
settings.changes_are_complete: Once your changes are complete, we strongly recommend that you go to your Booking Page to make a test appointment and verify the new settings.
settings.frequency_of_notifications: Change the frequency of notifications as appropriate for the recipient.
settings.choose_the_updates: Choose the updates you'd like to receive
settings.notifications_appointments: Get notifications for your appointments and your teamâ€™s
settings.notifications_your_appointments: Get notifications for only your appointments
settings.updates_staff_receive: Choose the updates for your staff to receive
settings.reminders_upcoming_bookings: Keep staff in the loop with automatic reminders for upcoming bookings
settings.updates_customer_receive: Choose the updates for your customer to receive
settings.automatic_email_reminders: Reduce no-shows with automatic email reminders for upcoming bookings
settings.recent_booking_updates: View your most recent booking updates.
settings.reach_support_team: Reach out to our 24/7 support team. We're all ears for your questions and feedback.
settings.question: Question
settings.want_log_out: Sure you want to log out?
settings.sync_your_setmore: Get a link to sync your Setmore calendar to another calendar.
settings.add_video_meetinglinks: Add video meeting links to appointments and classes.
settings.zoom_id_connect: Select a Zoom ID to connect
settings.nothing_report_date: Nothing to report for this date range. Please try another.
settings.showcase_star_feedback: Automate review requests and showcase 5-star feedback on your Booking Page.
settings.reviews_customers_hidedelete: Reviews from your customers will appear here. Publish, hide or delete them at any time.
settings.reviews_pendingpositive_feedback: Reviews displayed on your Booking Page will appear here. Have some pending? Publish positive feedback to draw in new customers!
settings.bookingpage_publish_delete: Reviews that you don’t want to display on your Booking Page will appear here. Publish or delete them at any time.
settings.feedback_enable_reviewsswitch: To collect feedback from customers, enable reviews using the switch above.
settings.lose_feedback_permanently: You'll lose this rating and feedback permanently. Once deleted, reviews can't be restored.

settings.name_to_continue: Please enter a name to continue.
settings.amount_to_countinue: Please enter an amount to continue.

settings.letters_numbers_hyphens: Enter letters, numbers and hyphens only.
settings.hide_setmore_branding: Hide Setmore branding to make your Booking Page your own.

settings.services_is_now_hidden_from_your_booking: Service is now hidden from your Booking Page
settings.services_is_now_visible_on_your_booking_: Service is now visible on your Booking Page
settings.year_next_billing: of every year. Next billing on
settings.invoice_needs_addressed: Enter the person name to whom the invoice needs to be addressed or the PO number. Can be left blank, not a mandatory field.
Your payment method was added successfully.
Your payment method was deleted successfully.
settings.please_contact_supportteam: Please contact our 24/7 support team at
settings.werent_charge_creditcard: Unfortunately, we weren't able to charge the credit card on file because your bank has not accepted the transaction.
settings.wetried_collect_payment: We tried to collect your payment but it looks like your account didn't have sufficient funds when you submitted.
settings.exceeded_accounts_withdrawal: Unfortunately, the payment exceeded your account's withdrawal limit. Please contact your bank or try a different payment method.
settings.collect_payment_activitylimit: Unfortunately, we tried to collect your payment but you have now exceeded the activity limit on your account. Please contact your bank or try a different payment method.
Unfortunately, it looks like your card has expired.
settings.accidentally_wrong_cardnumber: It seems you may have accidentally entered the wrong card number. Please double-check your details and try again. If that doesn't work, you may have to contact your bank.
settings.problem_with_expiration: It looks like there's a problem with the expiration date you provided. Please double-check it and try again. If that doesn't work, you may have to contact your bank.
settings.cardnumber_used_notfile: Unfortunately, the card number you used is not on file with your bank. If you're sure you used the right number, please contact your bank.
settings.cardnumber__doesnt_correctnumber: It looks like the card number you provided doesn't have the correct number of digits. Please double-check it and try again. If that doesn't work, you may have to contact your bank.
settings.problem_with_yourpayment: Unfortunately, there was a problem with your payment. It may just be a connectivity error. Please try again. If that doesn't work, you may have to contact your bank.
settings.entered_wrong_securitycode: Unfortunately, it looks like you may have entered the wrong security code or card number. Please double-check your details and try again. If that doesn't work, you may have to contact your bank.
settings.yourbank_requested_voiceauthorization: Your bank has requested voice authorization to complete this transaction. We'd suggest you try a different payment method.
settings.your_card_reportedlost: Unfortunately, it looks like your card has been reported as lost and we were unable to process your payment. Please contact your bank for more information.
settings.yourcard_reported_stolen: Unfortunately, it looks like your card has been reported stolen. Please contact your bank for more information.
settings.yourbank_declined_transaction: Unfortunately, your bank has declined the transaction. Please contact them for more information.
settings.duplicate_previously_payment: It seems this is a duplicate of a previously submitted payment. Your bank declined this one to prevent double-charging you.
settings.you_cancelled_transaction: We were notified that you cancelled this transaction. If this wasn't you, please contact your bank.
settings.you_cancelled_recurringpayment: We were notified that you cancelled your recurring payment. If this is a mistake, please contact us.
settings.yourbank_declinedtransaction_sometimes: Unfortunately, your bank declined the transaction. Sometimes this happens when the card doesn't support a certain type of purchase. Please contact your bank for more information.
settings.bank_declinedthis_transaction: Unfortunately, your bank declined this transaction. Please contact them for details.
settings.problem_payment_tryagain: Unfortunately, there was a problem with your payment. Please try again. If that doesn't work, contact us at the phone number or email below.
settings.cardused_replaced_newcard: We've been notified that the card you used has been replaced by a new card.
settings.wasproblem_with_payment: Unfortunately, there was a problem with your payment. Please try again. If that doesn't work, reach out to us by phone, chat or email.
settings.payment_been_reversed: Unfortunately, this payment has already been reversed. Please contact us for more information.
settings.problem_contactbank: Unfortunately, there was a problem with your payment. Please contact your bank for more information.
settings.recommend_contact_yourbank: Unfortunately, there was a problem with your payment. Please try again. If that doesn't work, we recommend that you contact your bank for more information.
